item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Label
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
[wptabs] [wptabtitle]Shitkatapult[/wptabtitle] [wptabcontent]LabelShitkatapult... why not?
10 years of the greatest business in the world (= no money, much stress) can do us no harm!! Shitkatapult and its side arms Musick, Meteosound and the publishing company Random Noize Musick have released over 100 records and what can we say, they are all great. We could not achieve world domination, as originally planned, but at least we can offer a very special brand of music and our understanding of running a good record label: we do what we like!!! Whether its cutting edge electronica, raw tech-rock, electronic composing, dubdope beats or fragile ambient epics. What else? Shitkatapult is always a decision: we do not play easy to get, we do not hype the hype. But if you like us, you stay with us, as the whole appearance from production, titles, cover artworks and performances is a rich program for special minds. Even if the music industry as a whole leaks and sinks, we will continue to introduce new artists and new musical ideas to the world through our imprints Shitkatapult, Musick and also Meteosound which has just got another kiss of life with a mainly digital release series of abstract downbeat and soultech releases for the future. So, order some T-shirts at Shopkatapult.com and dont watch too much TV. There are better things to do! For your records: Shitkatapult was founded in 1997 by Marco Haas, also known as T.Raumschmiere, and some of his friends. After moving to Berlin, Sascha Ring aka Apparat soon joined in and Daniel Meteo completed the new owner trio. Since 2007, Shitkatapult has been functioning under the roof of Random Noize Musick GmbH which includes all the three labels and the publishing company. Sascha Ring got sick of label office work and, after leaving the company, he now concentrates on his musical work. Our friend Florian Schmieg took Sascha's part and we are all happy now! Please visit our new websites which will be "on" soon. 2008 the year of contact. Thanks sirs and madams, Your surely mad ants from Berlin. [/wptabcontent] [wptabtitle]Random Noize Musick[/wptabtitle] [wptabcontent]PublisherWhy not Random Noize???

[wptabs] [wptabtitle]Shitkatapult[/wptabtitle] [wptabcontent]LabelShitkatapult why not?
10 years of the greatest business in the world (= no money, much stress) can do us no harm!! Shitkatapult and its side arms Musick, Meteosound and the publishing company Random Noize Musick have released over 100 records and what can we say, they are all great. We could not achieve world domination, as originally planned, but at least we can offer a very special brand of music and our understanding of running a good record label: we do what we like!!! Whether its cutting edge electronica, raw tech-rock, electronic composing, dubdope beats or fragile ambient epics.
What else? Shitkatapult is always a decision: we do not play easy to get, we do not hype the hype. But if you like us, you stay with us, as the whole appearance from production, titles, cover artworks and performances is a rich program for special minds. Even if the music industry as a whole leaks and sinks, we will continue to introduce new artists and new musical ideas to the world through our imprints Shitkatapult, Musick and also Meteosound which has just got another kiss of life with a mainly digital release series of abstract downbeat and soultech releases for the future. So, order some T-shirts at Shopkatapult.com and dont watch too much TV. There are better things to do!
For your records: Shitkatapult was founded in 1997 by Marco Haas, also known as T.Raumschmiere, and some of his friends. After moving to Berlin, Sascha Ring aka Apparat soon joined in and Daniel Meteo completed the new owner trio. Since 2007, Shitkatapult has been functioning under the roof of Random Noize Musick GmbH which includes all the three labels and the publishing company. Sascha Ring got sick of label office work and, after leaving the company, he now concentrates on his musical work. Our friend Florian Schmieg took Saschas part and we are all happy now! Please visit our new websites which will be on soon. 2008 the year of contact.
Thanks sirs and madams, Your surely mad ants from Berlin. [/wptabcontent]

item.title: SHITKATAPULT ONLINE!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Finally, after months of hard work, we are proud to present the new Shitkatapult-homepage! Here it is. Hopefully you like the new "look"; WE LOVE IT!!!
item.excerpt:encoded: Finally, after months of hard work, we are proud to present the new Shitkatapult-homepage! Here it is. Hopefully you like the new "look"; WE LOVE IT!!!

item.title: SHITPARADE 2008 IS OVER
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Thank you all for showin up at the Bar25 and celebrating with us the Shitparade and the relaunch of our new homepage. We had a great time... See You all next year!!!
item.excerpt:encoded: Thank you all for showin up at the Bar25 and celebrating with us the Shitparade and the relaunch of our new homepage. We had a great time... See You all next year!!!

item.title: T.RAUMSCHMIERE - new EP OUT NOW!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: In his best shape, T.RAUMSCHMIERE introduces the second 12" chapter of his upcoming album "I TANK U" by releasing "ANIMAL TERRITORY/BRENNER"! This 12" features the PUPPETMASTAZ and DEICHKIND w/ THE CRACK WHORE SOCIETY as debuting guest vocalists for the man behind monster wheels.
item.excerpt:encoded: In his best shape, T.RAUMSCHMIERE introduces the second 12" chapter of his upcoming album "I TANK U" by releasing "ANIMAL TERRITORY/BRENNER"! This 12" features the PUPPETMASTAZ and DEICHKIND w/ THE CRACK WHORE SOCIETY as debuting guest vocalists for the man behind monster wheels.

item.title: T.RAUMSCHMIERE - I TANK U out now!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Finally, the new T.Raumschmiere album "I Tank U" is available now as CD, strictly limited double CD with instrumental versions and MP3. Get it here. (verlinkt) The triple-vinyl-box will be released in November!
item.excerpt:encoded: Finally, the new T.Raumschmiere album "I Tank U" is available now as CD, strictly limited double CD with instrumental versions and MP3. Get it here. (verlinkt) The triple-vinyl-box will be released in November!

item.title: NEW ALBUM OUT NOW: ADIOS BERLIN!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Mark Boombastik & Eduardo Delgado Lopez's first album on Shitkatapult out now: "Adios Berlin" is an album like a speech, between accapella and beatbox, punk and rough cut - techno and experiments for a special audience aka Special Musick For Special People!!!
item.excerpt:encoded: Mark Boombastik & Eduardo Delgado Lopez's first album on Shitkatapult out now: "Adios Berlin" is an album like a speech, between accapella and beatbox, punk and rough cut - techno and experiments for a special audience aka Special Musick For Special People!!!

item.title: T.RAUMSCHMIERE IS BACK!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: His new EP titled THE RAVE IS ON is out now on Shitkatapult / Boxon Records. Three brand new rockers + a handful of remixes by Soul Center, Dilemn, Fukkk Offf and Pro7. Each music addict will be happy with this pack, as the first ones are especially for the dancefloor and the last on, "Duster" is a pretty experimental track. But check it out by yourself!
item.excerpt:encoded: His new EP titled THE RAVE IS ON is out now on Shitkatapult / Boxon Records. Three brand new rockers + a handful of remixes by Soul Center, Dilemn, Fukkk Offf and Pro7. Each music addict will be happy with this pack, as the first ones are especially for the dancefloor and the last on, "Duster" is a pretty experimental track. But check it out by yourself!

item.title: THE SORRY ENTERTAINERS - CD OUT NOW
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Bored of this rainy summer? Don't want to stay home all night and day? Then get this brilliant album "Local Jet Set" by THE SORRY ENTERTAINERS!!!! It lets the sun shining in your heart again... Check it out!
item.excerpt:encoded: Bored of this rainy summer? Don't want to stay home all night and day? Then get this brilliant album "Local Jet Set" by THE SORRY ENTERTAINERS!!!! It lets the sun shining in your heart again... Check it out!

item.title: MERRY X-MAS !!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
We wish you all a Merry X-mas and a Happy New Year!!! Thanks for your support over 2008. See ya next year.
Chin chin, your Shitkatapult team
item.excerpt:encoded:
We wish you all a Merry X-mas and a Happy New Year!!! Thanks for your support over 2008. See ya next year.
Chin chin, your Shitkatapult team

item.title: SHITKATAPULT STRIKE 100
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: We're doing a record release party for our STRIKE100 at Berlin Transmediale at Maria on the 25th of January!!! For more info check this . We'd love to see you there and celebrate this 100th release with all of you!!! Order your tickets here .
item.excerpt:encoded: We're doing a record release party for our STRIKE100 at Berlin Transmediale at Maria on the 25th of January!!! For more info and how to get the tickets check the link. We'd love to see you there and celebrate this 100th release with all of you!!!

item.title: Dear friends, fans, enemies -
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
we have a plan!!! In late january shitkatapult will release its hundredth record: strike 100. Its an exclusive compilation double cd focussed on the theme ambient electronic music. Feat tracks by T.Raumschmiere, The Orb, Jan Jelinek, Felix, Daniel Meteo, Anders Ilar and many many more.
For this we ask YOU to submit an artwork - front cover!!! But we want serious beautiful art - not shit work. So please submit your idea as .jpg or .tif until 27th of october to wolfgang[at]shitkatapult.com.
item.excerpt:encoded:
we have a plan!!! In late january shitkatapult will release its hundredth record: strike 100. Its an exclusive compilation double cd focussed on the theme ambient electronic music. Feat tracks by T.Raumschmiere, The Orb, Jan Jelinek, Felix, Daniel Meteo, Anders Ilar and many many more.
For this we ask YOU to submit an artwork - front cover!!! But we want serious beautiful art - not shit work. So please submit your idea as .jpg or .tif until 27th of october to wolfgang[at]shitkatapult.com.

item.title: THE BIG WELCOME!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The pulishing company RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK GmbH was founded by Marco Haas (T.Raumschmiere), Daniel Meteo and their lawyer Florian Schmieg in 2006. We're specialized in providing all our great music to companies all around the world to use them in films, videos, advertises and more. Our slogan: SPECIAL MUSICK FOR SPECIAL PEOPLE! Check out!
item.excerpt:encoded: The pulishing company RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK GmbH is now online

item.title: QWARTZ AWARDS
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Shitkatapult and our artists Apparat and Warren Suicide and our movie "Synken" are nominated for the Qwartz Awards, an independent electronic music award. Wow!!! Keep your fingers crossed - we'll keep you updated...
item.excerpt:encoded: Shitkatapult and our artists Apparat and Warren Suicide and our movie "Synken" are nominated for the Qwartz Awards, an independent electronic music award. Wow!!! Keep your fingers crossed - we'll keep you updated...

item.title: NEW MUSIC AVAILABLE
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: You can also check the instrumentals of this album on www.shitkatapult.com . Phon.o, one of Shitkatapult's greatest, and his buddy Chris de Luca (Ex-Funstörung) made this album possible.
item.excerpt:encoded: And here's a new album we want to present: CLP - Supercontinental.

item.title: ABOUT RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
RNM (short for Random Noize Musick GmbH) is the publishing company of a lot of different acts, like T.Raumschmiere, Apparat, Fenin, Daniel Meteo, CLP, and a lot more to come.

We deliver each firm with the perfect music to represent their company in ads and/or in movies. Name it and we'll find the best song. You can easily check out our artists' websites and our divisions Shitkatapult, Meteosound and Musick to play in the club. Just check the Links down on this page.
item.excerpt:encoded: We serve special musick not only for special people

item.title: STRIKE 100
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Our warmest feelings, deepest regards and endless thanks to our cover star, ANNA PIAGGI. The Italian fashion and art icon, writer, star was so generous to let us use her portrait on the wonderful cover. "...after receiving your last files with music I agree with the whole operation. What an emotion! Yours, Anna"
item.excerpt:encoded: Our warmest feelings, deepest regards and endless thanks to our cover star, ANNA PIAGGI. The Italian fashion and art icon, writer, star was so generous to let us use her portrait on the wonderful cover. "...after receiving your last files with music I agree with the whole operation. What an emotion! Yours, Anna"

item.title: DAS BIERBEBEN
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The new selftitled album by Das Bierbeben is out now. Available as Vinyl, CD and MP3. Besides, also available a limited radio CD single and a 12" with remixes by Chlo and T.Raumschmiere. Check it out and catch them on their tour in April/May.
item.excerpt:encoded: The new selftitled album by Das Bierbeben is out now. Available as Vinyl, CD and MP3. Besides, also available a limited radio CD single and a 12" with remixes by Chlo and T.Raumschmiere. Check it out and catch them on their tour in April/May.

item.title: METAL MACHINE OUT NOW!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The 3rd album by MOTOR is out now on Shitkatapult. Check it out, it's brilliant. They are supporting Depeche Mode on several European open air shows. See the dates section to get more information about it.
item.excerpt:encoded: The 3rd album by MOTOR is out now on Shitkatapult. Check it out, it's brilliant. They are supporting Depeche Mode on several European open air shows. See the dates section to get more information about it.

item.title: FREE MOTOR REMIX
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: As a new artist on SHITKATAPULT, and touring all over the world with DEPECHE MODE, MOTOR is finding its way into your speakers! MOTOR just took KANYE WEST's "Robocop" into a whole new realm, and definitely is not for sensitive ears. Download the track for free, and do not forget to catch MOTOR on tour in support of their album "METAL MACHINE"!
item.excerpt:encoded: As a new artist on SHITKATAPULT, and touring all over the world with DEPECHE MODE, MOTOR is finding its way into your speakers! MOTOR just took KANYE WEST's "Robocop" into a whole new realm, and definitely is not for sensitive ears. Download the track for free, and do not forget to catch MOTOR on tour in support of their album "METAL MACHINE"!

item.title: DEATH RAVE OUT NOW!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The notorious techno-rockers MOTOR return with their new single Death Rave, a ferociously tough turbo charged dance-floor destroyer that rocks out with unrestrained raw power. The vinyl version is limited to 300 copies!
item.excerpt:encoded: The notorious techno-rockers MOTOR return with their new single Death Rave, a ferociously tough turbo charged dance-floor destroyer that rocks out with unrestrained raw power. The vinyl version is limited to 300 copies!

item.title: NEW MOTOR VIDEO ONLINE!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Here's the new Motor video "DEATH RAVE"!!!! Watch it!!!
item.excerpt:encoded: Here's the new Motor video "DEATH RAVE"!!!! Watch it!!!

item.title: HAKAN LIDBO IS THE WINNER!!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Hakan Lidbo took part at the Depeche Mode remix contest on Beatport and - he made the FIRST place!!! Congratulations! Check it out on Beatport.
item.excerpt:encoded: Hakan Lidbo took part at the Depeche Mode remix contest on Beatport and - he made the FIRST place!!! Congratulations! Check it out on Beatport.

item.title: FREE DANIEL METEO TRACK
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Hey, here's a free track ready for download. Daniel Meteo's new album "Working Class" will be released in October and for all those who cannot wait for it here's "FWD" for free. Just follow the link.
item.excerpt:encoded: Hey, here's a free track ready for download. Daniel Meteo's new album "Working Class" will be released in October and for all those who cannot wait for it here's "FWD" for free. Just follow the link.

item.title: WORKING CLASS OUT NOW
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Jack of all Trades, Daniel Meteo splits his time up between many artistic activities. Along with Tom Thiel, he's one-half of the dub / hip-hop electronica duo Bus. Now, after his mega selling debut "Peruments" he returns with his first release on Shitkatapult: "Working Class" conjures up a painting, a patina-soaked classic, a precious collection: odd, heavy, dark, deep, bourgeois. ALBUM RELEASE PARTY will be at Berghain Kantine, October 7th.
item.excerpt:encoded: Jack of all Trades, Daniel Meteo splits his time up between many artistic activities. Along with Tom Thiel, he's one-half of the dub / hip-hop electronica duo Bus. Now, after his mega selling debut "Peruments" he returns with his first release on Shitkatapult: "Working Class" conjures up a painting, a patina-soaked classic, a precious collection: odd, heavy, dark, deep, bourgeois. ALBUM RELEASE PARTY will be at Berghain Kantine, October 7th.

item.title: T.RAUMSCHMIERE SPECIAL T-SHIRT OFFER
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: with any order of a t.raumschmiere item (except MP3s) you'll get a free "random noize musick" t-shirt!!! OR if you only order a t-shirt it's 8,00 euro each.
item.excerpt:encoded: with any order of a t.raumschmiere item (except MP3s) you'll get a free "random noize musick" t-shirt!!! OR if you only order a t-shirt it's 8,00 euro each.

item.title: NEW EP OUT NOW
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Daniel Meteo returns with his new EP" In Club Mood [with Abe Duque], with an awesome remix from Abe of "In The Mood". You will love it, believe us!!! The B-side comes with the original version and the non-album track "Audio Quattro". Get it at Shopkatapult now.
item.excerpt:encoded: Daniel Meteo returns with his new EP" In Club Mood [with Abe Duque], with an awesome remix from Abe of "In The Mood". You will love it, believe us!!! The B-side comes with the original version and the non-album track "Audio Quattro". Get it at Shopkatapult now.

item.title: RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
We proudly announce that APPARAT and T.RAUMSCHMIERE renewed the work with RNM.
Beside this we welcome RAZ OHARA and JULIA HUMMER at RNM publishing (co published by our friends at BUDDE).
item.excerpt:encoded: APPARAT and T.RAUMSCHMIERE renewed the work with RNM

item.title: New Album Out Now!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Raz Ohara and his Odd Orchestra return for their second album for Get Physical, II. It's a warm, organic collection of avant-garde, open-hearted pop music which positively teems with life; a forest of pleasures and possibilities which you'll want to lose yourself in indefinitely.

The origins of the album are in summer 2008, when Raz embarked on some informal jam sessions with guitarist Tom Krimi on the latter's outdoor terrace. This relaxed, natural approach to music-making suited the duo perfectly, and they soon decided to take it one step further: to escape the city, and write and record out in the countryside.  You can almost hear the fresh air blowing through II, the insect life teeming in its undergrowth.

Listen to it here: www.physical-music.com/mp3.pl
item.excerpt:encoded: New album out by RAZ OHARA and THE ODD ORCHESTRA: 2.

item.title: NEW SIGNING
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
they are based in berlin and produce music that might be described as pumping, popped out, strangely addictive electronic bon-bons. they specialize in twisted vocals and freaky beats which they display in a hard, hot and happy live set. Shitkatapult will release their new album IT'S DARK BUT IT'S OKAY the 19th of March worldwide.

Here are some links to check them out:

www.noticnastic.com
www.myspace.com/noticnastic
www.youtube.com/noticnastic

item.title: MOTOR EP OUT SOON
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: After the huge success of their latest album "Metal Machine" MOTOR are coming back with a digital-only EP "Autokill/Pitch123". This release will hit the streets the 12th of March 2010 and it's gonna mark the first release on Shitkatapult this year.

item.title: XENIA BELIAYEVA SIGNED TO RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Since the mid nineties initially in the artistic area for private views or similar on the move as a DJ, Xenia Beliayeva opened for Kraftwerk with Laurent Garnier in 1997 and for the centre for art and media technology (ZKM) in Karlsruhe. She then built up a continual presence as a club DJ from 2000 above all in her new home town of Hamburg. In particular her resident event "Kill them all" in the Hamburg Gum Club or her performances in Waagenbau (a nightclub in Hamburg) gained Xenia a reputation as one of the hottest DJ insider tips of the hanseatic city.
item.excerpt:encoded: "I have always sung, and for about four years I have been building my vocals into my deejaying as a central element. Of course I see myself first and foremost as a DJ for electronic music, or Techno to be more precise, but I dont want to limit myself to this role."

item.title: SID LE ROCK SIGNED TO RANDOM NOIZE MUSICK
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
We are totally happy that Sid Le Rock signed to Random Noize Musick recently. He will release a new album, too, on Shitkatapult in late June '10, titled "Tout Va Bien".

For all the friends/fans/folks who cannot wait so long, here's a new track off his upcoming album, STILL LIFE , ready for free download .

Here are some links to find out more:

www.sidlerock.com            www.myspace.com/rockno

item.title: SHITPARADE - July 3rd
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: THANK YOU ALL for coming to our Shitparade 2010!!!!! Hope, you all had a good time - definitely we had! And also a "high five" to Soul Center, Sid Le Rock, T.Raumschmiere, Fenin, Phon.o, Strobocop, Daniel Meteo, and Frank Bretschneider for joining, and Daniel and all at Club Maria for making this possible. See you next year!

See you next year!

item.title: SOUL CENTER EP OUT NOW
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: GE01 is the name of the new EP by Soul Center aka Thomas Brinkmann. In September, we will release his brandnew album "General Eclectics", but let's start with the 12 inches of GE01 which reverses the tracklisting and kicks off with Soul Center's sure-fire floor filler. Fun is a hot gun.

In September, we will release his brandnew album "General Eclectics", but let's start with the 12 inches of GE01 which reverses the tracklisting and kicks off with Soul Center's sure-fire floor filler. Fun is a hot gun.

item.title: SOUL CENTER SIGNED
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: We are very proud that Thomas Brinkmann aka Soul Center signed to us. He just released his new EP on Shitkatapult, GE 01 , to feed the world with brand new and very hot tracks. He will also release the album GENERAL ECLECTICS on Shitkatapult, September the11th. And as far as I can tell you now: It's gonna be H O T ! ! !
item.excerpt:encoded: SOUL CENTER aka THOMAS BRINKMANN is the new artist signed to Random Noize Musick.

item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The new album GENERAL ECLECTICS by Thomas Brinkmann aka SOUL CENTER is out now on Shitkatapult. Additionally, there is also the second EP vinyl GE02 available now. Get all at your local record dealer or directly at shopkatapult.com.

item.title: OUT NOW - XENIA BELIAYEVA - DUMPFE TRAEUME
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Xenia Beliayeva returns with her new Digital-only-EP "Dumpfe Traeume". The title track is also featured in the German vampire movie WIR SIND DIE NACHT, starting Oct 28th at a cinema near you. The EP also features an exclusive instrumental version of "Know Me" off her latest album "Ever Since". Check it out!

The title track is also featured in the German vampire movie WIR SIND DIE NACHT, starting Oct 28th at a cinema near you. The EP also features an exclusive instrumental version of "Know Me" off her latest album "Ever Since". Check it out!

item.content:encoded: Our favorite Dub-, Reggae-, House- Hero Lars Fenin returns with his third album MIXES & MAXIS on Shitkatapult. Besides, there is also his new EP NONE OF THEM with two brilliant remixes by Robag Wruhme available now. Go, check it out!!!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: New album by OVAL
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Here are some press quotes:

"A triumphant return for Oval, both musically and intellectually. This is meta music for the soul." - FACT Magazine

"Where there used to be glitches and electronic noise there are now guitars and drums. But that is the least important thing on "O". What is truly relevant, his distinguished past aside, is that Oval has done it. Again. He has given birth to a record that could and should change the route of modern music." - Playgroundmag.net

"It's one mark of genius that the more you try to be different, the more you sound like yourself. It's wrong to overstate the continuities over the immediately obvious difference, but this music could only have been made by one man." - WIRE

"Incredibly, through a ten-year gap, complete shift in approach, software and even ideology, Popp has still managed to make what still sounds like an Oval album - possibly the best one of his career." - Exclaim.ca

"O is delicate and precise, supremely detailed and guided by beautiful, yearning melodies that evolve in slow motion (...)  it's up there with 2010's best". - THE GUARDIAN

"The floating, lively and energetic music on these two formats simply cannot be passed over this year. Reinventing yourself can hardly be done any better." - De:Bug

"To call Oval an electronic music pioneer is like saying James Joyce ‘kinda did things with novels.'" -The Stool Pigeon

"That Popp is able to work all these elements into anything remotely rhythmic is testament to his programming skills; that the end result is so endlessly listenable, is miraculous. "New start" or not, O is a work of vibrant and often brutal beauty that proves good things really do come to those who wait." - The Quietus

"Bela Bartok, John Cage, Brian Eno. And...Oval." - SPEX

 "The new Oval sounds clean and quick, with each pluck, quiver, and beat standing out in stark relief... O is not a retro move, but the work of an artist dealing with the now." - Dusted

"A guitar dangling over his shoulder and equipped with a remarkably unconventional approach to harmony, Popp is doing things his own way, walking hand in hand with his laptop and finding the perfect medium between personal expression and computer-aided composition." - Tokafi.com

"Oval's double CD O is deliberately enigmatic yet immediately entertaining, nothing short of a small masterpiece." - YourFlesh Mag

"Listened to closely, each track reveals a precise and jewel-like structure, while in it totality, O refuses any intimation of form that might restrict the experience of listening to it. With its constant changes in tempo, O appears to stretch time elastically, becoming seemingly endless." - BBC Music Review

"It's lovely, it's pleasantly unsettling... It takes a very different route from his earlier work. If it ends up in a very similar place that just suggests his musical sensibilities have been asserting themselves all along." - Pitchfork

"Popp is smart enough to achieve the unheard, deft enough to have a signature sound without doing the same thing over and over again. Like Eno 20-plus years ago, his work is not only superlative, fascinating and totally listenable, it's a template for future research." - Mike McGonigal
item.excerpt:encoded: Oval, Random Noize Musick's latest artist, released his new album O in various formats on ThrillJockey: as 2-CD, double LP and Oh-EP; altogether 76 Tracks!!!

item.title: WELCOME 2011 !!!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Happy new year everyone! We start the year 2011 with this fine new ep "Tout Va Plus" by SID LE ROCK. This one bridges the gap between his last album TOUT VA BIEN and his upcoming brand new ep GENTLEMEN'S INTERMISSION, due out in March. Check it out!
item.excerpt:encoded: Happy new year everyone! We start the year 2011 with this fine new ep "Tout Va Plus" by SID LE ROCK. This one bridges the gap between his last album TOUT VA BIEN and his upcoming brand new ep GENTLEMEN'S INTERMISSION, due out in March. Check it out!

item.title: FRANK BRETSCHNEIDER - KOMET
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Out now: The new album "Komet" by Frank Bretschneider. Seven tracks, which have been recorded and arranged live at the studio; seven tracks with an enormous depth and passion and love for detail on a straight beat, manifesting their own version of club music.
item.excerpt:encoded: Out now: The new album "Komet" by Frank Bretschneider. Seven tracks, which have been recorded and arranged live at the studio; seven tracks with an enormous depth and passion and love for detail on a straight beat, manifesting their own version of club music.

item.title: NEW ALBUM BY TOM THIEL
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Tom Thiel's self titled debut album out now!!! Wide melody lines, soft, complex beats or direct, simple beats: the tracks speak a timeless language and thus represent the most modern side of electronic music. A musical director and his audio cinema, way beyond Hollywood or worse - New German Cinema.
item.excerpt:encoded: Tom Thiel's self titled debut album out now!!! Wide melody lines, soft, complex beats or direct, simple beats: the tracks speak a timeless language and thus represent the most modern side of electronic music. A musical director and his audio cinema, way beyond Hollywood or worse - New German Cinema.
